data.name: WIC Lucifer Expedition
data.desc: Hendrick Jacobszoon Lucifer of GWC takes some ships of Sp Hon fotilla
data.locn: Vlissingen, Oyapock R, Cabo de la Vela, Rio de la Hacha, Île-à-Vache, Jam, Cayman, Cabo de San Antonio, Straits of Florida
data.agents_nsp0: Hendrick Jacobszoon Lucifer, Jan Pieterszoon, Galeyn van Stapels 3 Ships / later 2 Yachts
data.prim_n: Wright D 1 pp *101-*103, *171 [Cristóbal Aranda to Crown a 16 jul 1627 / Report by Tomás de Larraspuru 10 nov 1627, and of president of Council of Indies, Madrid, 22 nov 1627] / Add MS 36322 / Laet [missg] = Laet port [missg] 154-162
data.note: Location /v Alves 51 / Location should include Comaribo, near or on Oyapock R /v Laet [missg] = Laet port [missg] p 155
